name: Consolidated Edison, Inc.
description: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) is one of the largest energy companies in the United States, providing electric, gas, and steam service to millions of customers in New York City and Westchester County. Founded in 1824, Con Edison has a long history of delivering reliable energy solutions while also focusing on sustainability and innovation. The company operates through several subsidiaries, including Consolidated Edison Company of New York, Orange and Rockland Utilities, and Con Edison Transmission. Con Edison is committed to reducing its carbon footprint and has invested heavily in renewable energy sources, energy efficiency programs, and advanced technology to modernize the energy grid. The company is actively working towards a cleaner energy future by expanding its renewable energy portfolio and planning for the impacts of climate change. With a strong emphasis on customer service, Con Edison offers various programs to help customers manage their energy usage and save on bills. The company's mission is to provide safe, reliable, and affordable energy while contributing to the economic vitality of the regions it serves.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

faq.answer: Timothy C. Cawley is the CEO of Consolidated Edison, Inc.

faq.answer: Con Edison is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.
